name: iZombie
description: IZU is a utility token of the iZombie Universe - Play-To-Earn NFT GameFI. Required for the purchase of Zombies, Game Items, Roulette. IZU token is used for farming and staking, acts as a reward for participating in game events. Token holders can vote and influence the development of the project. The IZU token will be required to participate in the launchpads of iZombie Universe digital incubator.
